sentences.en: A sedentary office life exerts an extremely bad influence on people's health.
sentences.cn: 久坐不起的办公室生活给人们的健康带来及其不良的影响.

sentences.en: a sedentary people living north of the Danube
sentences.cn: 多瑙河北面的一个定居民族
会计是一种需要坐着工作的职业.

sentences.en: Fast food and sedentary life lead to the increasing rate of obesity.
sentences.cn: 快餐和久坐不动的生活导致肥胖率上升.

sentences.en: His lameness made him fond of sedentary occupation.
sentences.cn: 他的残废使他喜欢做些案头工作.

sentences.en: I don't think a sedentary life would altogether suit me.
sentences.cn: 我认为长期伏案的生活一点也不适合我。
我对坐着做的工作已经腻了.

sentences.en: It was immediately attributed to their sedentary life.
sentences.cn: 这一点立刻归咎于他们终日伏案的生活.

sentences.en: Obesity and a sedentary lifestyle has been linked with an increased risk of heart disease.
sentences.cn: 肥胖和久坐不动的生活方式被认为会增加患心脏病的几率。

sentences.en: People in sedentary jobs need to take exercise.
sentences.cn: 工作上要久坐的人需要做运动.

sentences.en: Sedentary can cause people to mental depression, Aichi Wumingzhihuo , poor mental state.
sentences.cn: 久坐会导致人心理压抑,爱发无名之火, 精神状态欠佳.

sentences.en: Sedentary will lead to muscle ache, stiff neck and headache and dizziness.
sentences.cn: 久坐不动会引发全身肌肉酸痛 、 脖子僵硬和头痛头晕.

sentences.en: Still, I am strongly in favour of being less sedentary.
sentences.cn: 不过, 我还是强烈建议我们不要老是久坐不动.

sentences.en: That means 1,800 for sedentary men and 1,500 for sedentary women.
sentences.cn: 这意味着久坐的男性卡路里摄入量是1800,久坐的女性是1500.

sentences.en: Wind has little influence on sedentary aphids.
sentences.cn: 风对不动的蚜虫很少有影响.

trans.tran_cn: 坐着的，（指工作等）坐着干的，案头的，（指人）不爱活动的
trans.tran_en: spending a lot of time sitting down, and not moving or exercising very much
